en.zmejelov_intro_OG: is an upgraded version of the original game that comes with a story. For beginners, the game is quite difficult, so quite a lot of help is implemented. The game automatically saves your progress, so you can pause at any time and continue when you feel like challenging yourself again.
en.please_login: To play, please log in or register.
en.q1_OG: HOW DO I SAVE GAME PROGRESS?
en.q2_OG: WHAT DO I DO IF MY GAME GLITCHES OUT?
en.q3_OG: WHY DO I RESPAWN AT LEVEL 4?
en.a1_OG: Game progress is saved automatically at the begining of each level?
en.a2_OG: Reload the page, but if the problem persist don't hasitate me to contact me with the form?
en.a3_OG: Because you died and where are dead people? In the graveyard! Joke aside, it is because you are playing HARD difficulty and you died without unlocking any checkpoint

en.please_login_comments: To comment please login or register
en.zmejelov_1960: je prvotna verzija aplikacije zasnovana v davnem 2021 letu. Danes je na voljo v svoji originali formi, edina dodana stvar k igri je en dosežek, ki ga lahko dosežeš. Kljub temu, da je igra za izkušene igralce zelo hitra in enostavna, lahko na začetku novim igralcem ponuja malo preglavic, tako da, v primeru težav, ne obupati z igranjem. Igra je primerna tudi za vse 'OG', ki želijo podoživeti  nostalgijo igranja prvotne verzije!
en.q1_1960: Why is this game so easy?
en.a1_1960: Maybe you are just so good 😉
en.intro_essay: »RAČUNALNIK NE DELA NAPAK, PREPROSTO IZVRŠUJE TO, KAR MU UKAŽEMO«
en.github_essay: Odprto kodni projekt, vsa koda na voljo na githubu
en.welcome_again: Še enkrat pozdravljeni na ZMEJELOV IGRALNI PLATFORMI. Moje ime je Zmeja in moram priznati, da sem zelo vesela,da te vidim! Na portalu je 5 iger:
en.welcome_again2: Če mene vprašaš moraš preigrati vse xd. Veselo igranje.
en.welcome_again3: Naj poudarim, da sem zelo vesela, da te vidim! Na portalu je 5 iger za veliko ur igranja, z dosežki pa te spodbujam k igranju. Če mene vprašaš moraš preigrati vse xd. Za njihovo uporabo pa se moraš registrirati s klikom tukaj ali pa prijaviti s klikom tukaj. Veselo igranje.

en.subject: SUBJECT
en.welcome_intro: Welcome to Zmejelov Gaming platform, my name is Zmeja and I am quite an important person here (if you ask me 😇). On the portal there are 5 games with different tricks, traps, each game also has its own achievements to motivate you. Try to become the best on the leaderboard, comment and connect with friends! If you ask me it is totally worth it to spend hours here. What do you say, are you ready to start exloring the world of advantures and excitment?
